system.name: Financial Assistant
system.description: An AI-based assistant designed to help users with financial data queries, stock information, and web-based research related to finance.
primary_goals: Provide accurate and up-to-date financial data
Assist users in making informed financial decisions
key_capabilities: Conducting web-based research to gather supplemental information
Summarizing and presenting gathered information clearly

agents.name: Supervisor Agent
agents.description: Oversees the conversation and determines which specialized agent should handle the current user request.
responsibilities: Route user requests to the appropriate agent
Ensure all necessary data is collected before summarizing

requirements.name: Retrieve Stock Prices
requirements.description: The system should be able to fetch the current stock price for a given symbol.

scenarios.name: Fetch Current Stock Price
scenarios.description: A user wants to know the current stock price of a specific company.

personas.name: Individual Investor
personas.description: A person investing their own money who needs accurate and timely financial data to make informed decisions.
